Planetary Orbital Evolution due to Tides
Orbital evolution of two objects experiencing tides

8 #define BUILDING_LIBRARY
9 #include "SaturatingSkumanichWindBody.h"
10 #include "WindSaturationCondition.h"
11 
12 namespace Star {
13 
14  double SaturatingSkumanichWindBody::angular_momentum_loss(
15  Evolve::Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry
16  ) const
17  {
18  double result = (
19  __wind_strength*std::sqrt(radius() / mass())
20  *
21  (
22  __saturated
23  ? spin_frequency() * std::pow(__saturation_freq, 2)
24  : std::pow(spin_frequency(), 3)
25  )
26  );
27  double freq_power = (__saturated ? 1.0 : 3.0);
28  switch(entry) {
29  case Evolve::Dissipation::NO_DERIV :
30  return result;
31  case Evolve::Dissipation::SPIN_FREQUENCY :
32  return freq_power * result / spin_frequency();
33  case Evolve::Dissipation::RADIUS :
34  return result / (2.0 * radius());
35  case Evolve::Dissipation::MOMENT_OF_INERTIA :
36  return -freq_power * result / zone(0).moment_of_inertia();
37  case Evolve::Dissipation::SPIN_ANGMOM :
38  return freq_power * result / zone(0).angular_momentum();
39  default :
40  return 0;
41  }
42  }
43 
44  Evolve::CombinedStoppingCondition *
45  SaturatingSkumanichWindBody::stopping_conditions(
46  Evolve::BinarySystem &system,
47  bool primary
48  )
49  {
50 #ifndef NDEBUG
51  if(primary) assert(this == &(system.primary()));
52  else assert(this == &(system.secondary()));
53  assert(__detected_saturation);
54 #endif
55  Evolve::CombinedStoppingCondition *result =
56  new Evolve::CombinedStoppingCondition();
57  if(system.evolution_mode() != Core::LOCKED_SURFACE_SPIN)
58  (*result) |= new WindSaturationCondition(
59  *this,
60  (primary ? system.secondary() : system.primary()),
61  primary,
62  __saturated
63  );
64  (*result) |= Evolve::DissipatingBody::stopping_conditions(system,
65  primary);
66  return result;
67  }
68 
69 }//End Star namespace.
